Title: Relates to providing a daily report on unused COVID-19 vaccines
Summary: Requires the department of health to prepare a daily report on the number of unused COVID-19 vaccines throughout the state.
LawCode: Ren ยง2182 to be ยง2183, add ยง2182, Pub Health L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law, in relation to providing a daily report on unused COVID-19 vaccines; and to provide for the expiration and repeal of such provision upon the expiration thereof
